mapper.select: select case sex when 1 then '男' else '女' end name , count(1) value from t_member group by sex

SELECT (CASE WHEN a.age IS NULL THEN 'unknown' WHEN a.age < 18 THEN '0-18岁' WHEN a.age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 THEN '18-30岁' WHEN a.age BETWEEN 31 AND 45 THEN '30-45岁' WHEN a.age > 45 THEN '45岁以上' END) as name, COUNT(1) 'value' FROM (SELECT NOW() AS "时间",birthday,TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) AS age FROM t_member )a GROUP BY name
